attributes.action: Allow freedom of speach, but with consequences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Freedom of speech is a fundamental human right. So is the right to live free of fear. Therefore, extremists should be allowed to express their views while present in my country, but if those views could be deemed to incite others to engage in terrorist activities, those people expressing their views should be stripped of their citizenship or resident status, and exiled. The basic idea of, "if you don't like what's on the TV change the channel," should apply here - If you dislike our country so much that you wish it harm, leave.
